cyclone.name: FRED
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles south of Panama City, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving northward across the northeastern Gulf of Mexico toward the Florida Panhandle
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: western Florida Panhandle (near or east of Panama City, FL)
